input_email_body:
Subject: 

To the customer support team, I am contacting you to report a problem My name is Carlos Mendoza.. The situation is as follows: Investment predictions have not performed as expected You can reach me at fatima.farsi@help.com.. The reason for this is a lack of adequate data analytics training. I have already attempted to review the algorithms and rerun the models. I would greatly appreciate any assistance you could provide in resolving this issue.
